Text: Is this real ? i thought this was not out till 2nd November?

WOW!!!! This is fuckin SLAYER alright. Great stuff, I have this pre-ordered & it comes with a dvd also, I strongly suggest all you true slayer fans to go buy it also when it comes out, This band totally deserve your support. I FUKIN LOVE THIS BAND!!

HAIL SLAAAAYYYERRR
